original: Nicchāto, mokkho vimokkho, vijjāvimutti, adhisīlaṁ, adhicittaṁ, adhipaññā, passaddhi,
analyzed: nicchātaḥ mokkhaḥ vimokkhaḥ vijjā vimutti adhi sīla adhi citta adhi paññā passaddhi

original: ñāṇaṁ, dassanaṁ, visuddhi, nekkhammaṁ, nissaraṇaṁ, paviveko, vosaggo, cariyā, jhānavimokkho,
analyzed: ñāṇa dassana visuddhi nekkhamma nissaraṇa pavivekaḥ vosaggaḥ cariyā jhāna vimokkho

original: Nicchātoti nekkhammena kāmacchandato nicchāto, abyāpādena byāpādato nicchāto …pe…
analyzed: nicchātaḥ ti nekkhammena kāmacchandataḥ nicchātaḥ abyāpādena byāpādataḥ nicchātaḥ pe
mokkhaḥ vimokkhaḥ ti nekkhammena kāmacchandataḥ muccati iti
arahatta maggena sabba kilesehi muccati iti

original: Vijjāvimuttīti nekkhammaṁ vijjatīti vijjā, kāmacchandato muccatīti vimutti.
analyzed: vijjā vimutti iti nekkhammam vijjati iti vijjā kāma chandataḥ muccati iti vimutti

original: Abyāpādo vijjatīti vijjā, byāpādato vimuccatīti vimutti.
analyzed: a byāpādaḥ vijjati iti vijjā byāpādataḥ vimuccati iti vimutti

original: arahattamaggo vijjatīti vijjā, sabbakilesehi muccatīti vimutti.
analyzed: arahatta maggaḥ vijjati iti vijjā sabba kilesehi muccati iti vimutti

original: Adhisīlaṁ adhicittaṁ adhipaññāti nekkhammena kāmacchandaṁ, saṁvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi, avikkhepaṭṭhena cittavisuddhi, dassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhivisuddhi.
analyzed: adhisīlam adhicittam adhipaññāti nekkhammena kāma chanda savara ṭṭhena sīla visuddhi avikkhepa ṭṭhena citta visuddhi dassana ṭṭhena diṭṭhi visuddhi
yaḥ tattha savaraṭṭhaḥ ayam adhi sīla sikkhā
yaḥ tattha a vikkhepa aṭṭhaḥ ayam adhi citta sikkhā
yaḥ tattha dassana ṭṭhaḥ ayam adhi paññā sikkhā
a byāpādena byāpādam sa varaṭṭhena sīla visuddhi pe

original: arahattamaggena sabbakilese saṁvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi, avikkhepaṭṭhena cittavisuddhi.
analyzed: arahatta maggena sabba kilese savara ṭṭhena sīla visuddhi avikkhepa ṭṭhena citta visuddhi
yaḥ tattha savaraṭṭhaḥ ayam adhi sīla sikkhā
yaḥ tattha a vikkhepa aṭṭhaḥ ayam adhi citta sikkhā
yaḥ tattha dassana ṭṭhaḥ ayam adhi paññā sikkhā

original: Passaddhīti nekkhammena kāmacchandaṁ paṭippassambheti, abyāpādena byāpādaṁ paṭippassambheti …pe…
analyzed: passaddhi iti nekkhammena kāmacchandam paṭippassambheti abyāpādena byāpādam paṭippassambheti pe

original: Ñāṇanti kāmacchandassa pahīnattā nekkhammaṁ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṁ;
analyzed: ñāṇan ti kāmacchandassa pahīna ttā nekkhammam ñāta ṭṭhena ñāṇa
byāpādassa pahīna ttā abyāpādaḥ ñāta ṭṭhena ñāṇam pe
sabba kilesānam pahīna ttā arahatta maggo ñāta ṭṭhena ñāṇa

original: Dassananti kāmacchandassa pahīnattā nekkhammaṁ diṭṭhattā dassanaṁ.
analyzed: dassanam ti kāmacchandassa pahīna ttā nekkhammam diṭṭha ttā dassana
byāpādassa pahīna ttā a byāpādaḥ diṭṭha ttā dassanam pe
sabba kilesānam pahīna ttā arahatta maggo diṭṭha ttā dassana
visuddhi iti kāmacchandam pajahantaḥ nekkhammena visujjhati
byāpādam pajahantaḥ a byāpādena visujjhati pe
sabba kilese pajahantaḥ arahatta maggena visujjhati
nekkhammanti kāmānam etam nissaraṇa yat idam nekkhamma

original: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ, nirodho tassa nekkhammaṁ.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci bhūtam saṅkhatam paṭiccasamuppanna nirodho tassa nekkhamma
nissaraṇam ti kāmānam etam nissaraṇa yat idam nekkhamma

original: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ, nirodho tassa nissaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci bhūtam saṅkhatam paṭiccasamuppanna nirodho tassa nissaraṇa
paviveko ti kāmacchandassa nekkhammaṃ paviveko pe
vosaggaḥ ti nekkhammena kāmacchandam vosajjati iti
arahatta maggena sabba kilese vosajjati iti
cariyā ati kāmacchandam pajahantaḥ nekkhammena carati
sabba kilese pajahantaḥ arahatta maggena carati
jhāna vimokkhaḥ ti nekkhammam jhāyati iti
jhāte ca jhāpe ca jānāti iti
jhāte ca jhāpe ca jānāti iti

original: Bhāvanā adhiṭṭhānaṁ jīvitanti kāmacchandaṁ pajahanto nekkhammaṁ bhāvetīti—
analyzed: bhāvanā adhiṭṭhānam jīvitanti kāmacchandam pajahantaḥ nekkhammam bhāveti iti

original: Svāyaṁ evaṁ bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno samaṁ jīvati, no visamaṁ;
analyzed: evam bhāvanā sampannaḥ adhiṭṭhāna sampanno samam jīvati no

original: Svāyaṁ evaṁ bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno ājīvasampanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—
analyzed: svāyam evam bhāvanā sampannaḥ adhiṭṭhāna sampannaḥ ājīva sampannaḥ yaññat eva parisam upasaṅkamati

original: yadi khattiyaparisaṁ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ yadi samaṇaparisaṁ—
analyzed: yadi khattiya parisam yadi brāhmaṇa parisam yadi gahapati parisam yadi samaṇa parisa

original: Tathā hi so bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno ājīvasampanno.
analyzed: tathā hi so bhāvanā sampannaḥ adhiṭṭhāna sampannaḥ ājīva sampannaḥ
byāpādam pajahantaḥ a byāpādam bhāveti iti
thinam iddham pajahantaḥ āloka saññam bhāveti iti
vicikiccham pajahantaḥ dhamma vavatthānam bhāveti iti
nīvaraṇe pajahantaḥ paṭhamam jhānam bhāveti iti
sabba kilese pajahantaḥ arahatta maggam bhāveti iti
arahatta magga vasena cittam adhiṭṭhāti iti

original: Svāyaṁ evaṁ bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno samaṁ jīvati, no visamaṁ;
analyzed: evam bhāvanā sampannaḥ adhiṭṭhāna sampanno samam jīvati no

original: Svāyaṁ evaṁ bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno ājīvasampanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—
analyzed: svāyam evam bhāvanā sampannaḥ adhiṭṭhāna sampannaḥ ājīva sampannaḥ yaññat eva parisam upasaṅkamati

original: yadi khattiyaparisaṁ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ yadi samaṇaparisaṁ—
analyzed: yadi khattiya parisam yadi brāhmaṇa parisam yadi gahapati parisam yadi samaṇa parisa

original: Tathā hi so bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno ājīvasampannoti.
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ bhāvanā sampannaḥ adhiṭṭhāna sampannaḥ ājīva sampannaḥ iti
